SELECT timelastmodified, f.feature_id AS id, f.organism_id, f.is_obsolete AS obsolete, dbx.*, db.*, fr.feature_relationship_id, fr.object_id, fr.type_id AS relation_type_id, fr.rank, fr.value AS relation_value, fl.strand, fmin, fmax, f.name AS feature_name, uniquename, f.type_id, f.seqlen, fp.featureprop_id, fp.type_id AS prop_type_id, fp.rank AS prop_rank, fp.value, fl.phase FROM feature f LEFT JOIN featureloc fl ON ( f.feature_id = fl.feature_id
AND srcfeature_id=$featureLoc.featureBySrcFeatureId.featureId$ ) LEFT JOIN feature_relationship fr ON fr.subject_id = f.feature_id LEFT JOIN featureprop fp ON fp.feature_id = f.feature_id LEFT JOIN dbxref dbx ON f.dbxref_id = dbx.dbxref_id LEFT JOIN db ON dbx.db_id = db.db_id WHERE
srcfeature_id=$featureLoc.featureBySrcFeatureId.featureId$
fl.fmin >= $featureLoc.fmin$ AND fl.fmax < $featureLoc.fmax$
uniquename LIKE #uniqueName#
ORDER BY f.type_id, uniquename

SELECT timelastmodified, f.feature_id AS id, uniquename, organism_id AS organismId, f.is_obsolete AS obsolete, f.name AS feature_name, f.type_id, f.dbxref_id AS dbXRefId, f.seqlen, residues FROM feature f
LEFT JOIN cvterm ON f.type_id=cvterm.cvterm_id
WHERE
f.feature_id=$featureId$ AND
f.feature_id=#featureSynonyms[].feature.featureId#
( uniquename LIKE #uniqueName# ESCAPE '/' OR f.name LIKE #uniqueName# ESCAPE '/') AND
f.type_id=$cvTerm.cvTermId$ AND
cvterm.name=#cvTerm.name# AND
f.feature_id > 0

SELECT timelastmodified, f.feature_id AS id, uniquename, organism_id AS organismId, f.is_obsolete AS obsolete, f.name AS feature_name, f.type_id, f.dbxref_id AS dbXRefId, f.seqlen, residues FROM feature f WHERE f.feature_id=$featureId$
SELECT uniquename, cvTerm.name, feature_id AS id FROM feature f LEFT JOIN cvterm ON cvterm.cvterm_id=type_id WHERE f.feature_id=$featureId$

SELECT timelastmodified, f.feature_id AS id, uniquename, organism_id AS organismId, f.is_obsolete AS obsolete, f.name AS feature_name, f.type_id, f.dbxref_id, f.seqlen, fp.type_id AS prop_type_id, fp.rank AS prop_rank, fp.value, fp.featureprop_id, dbxref.*, db.* FROM feature f LEFT JOIN featureprop fp ON fp.feature_id=f.feature_id LEFT JOIN dbxref ON f.dbxref_id=dbxref.dbxref_id LEFT JOIN db ON dbxref.db_id=db.db_id WHERE f.feature_id=$featureId$

SELECT timelastmodified, f.feature_id AS id, uniquename, organism_id AS organismId, f.is_obsolete AS obsolete, f.name AS feature_name, f.type_id, f.dbxref_id AS dbXRefId, f.seqlen, fp.type_id AS prop_type_id, fp.rank AS prop_rank, fp.value, fp.featureprop_id, dbxref.*, db.* FROM feature f LEFT JOIN featureprop fp ON fp.feature_id=f.feature_id LEFT JOIN dbxref ON f.dbxref_id=dbxref.dbxref_id LEFT JOIN db ON dbxref.db_id=db.db_id WHERE f.feature_id IN $[]$

sqlMap.select: ( SELECT feature_id FROM featureloc WHERE srcfeature_id IN ( SELECT feature_id FROM featureloc WHERE srcfeature_id=$value$) ) ORDER BY f.feature_id
( SELECT feature_id FROM featureloc WHERE srcfeature_id IN $[]$ ) ORDER BY f.feature_id

SELECT f.feature_id AS id, f.uniquename AS cluster_name, cv_f.name AS cluster_cvterm, f1.uniquename AS subject_name, fr.subject_id, cv_fr.name AS fr_name, common_name AS subject_common_name, cv_f1.name AS subject_cvterm, rawscore, normscore, significance, identity, a.analysis_id, a.name, description, program, programversion, algorithm, sourcename, sourceversion,sourceuri, timeexecuted FROM feature f LEFT JOIN feature_relationship fr ON f.feature_id=fr.object_id LEFT JOIN analysisfeature af ON f.feature_id=af.feature_id LEFT JOIN analysis a ON af.analysis_id=a.analysis_id LEFT JOIN feature f1 ON f1.feature_id=subject_id LEFT JOIN organism ON f1.organism_id=organism.organism_id LEFT JOIN cvterm AS cv_f1 ON cv_f1.cvterm_id=f1.type_id LEFT JOIN cvterm AS cv_fr ON cv_fr.cvterm_id=fr.type_id LEFT JOIN cvterm AS cv_f ON cv_f.cvterm_id=f.type_id WHERE f.feature_id IN #[]# AND cv_f.name LIKE '%match%'
SELECT schema_name FROM information_schema.schemata WHERE schema_name=schema_owner ORDER BY schema_name
SELECT DISTINCT type_id FROM feature WHERE residues notnull

SELECT feature.name, uniquename, feature_id, type_id, feature.organism_id, abbreviation, genus, species, common_name, cvterm.name AS cvterm_name FROM cvterm LEFT JOIN feature ON cvterm.cvterm_id=feature.type_id LEFT JOIN organism ON organism.organism_id=feature.organism_id WHERE feature.organism_id=$value$ AND ( cvterm.name LIKE '%chromosome%' OR cvterm.name LIKE '%sequence%' OR cvterm.name IN ('supercontig', 'ultra_scaffold', 'golden_path_region', 'contig') ) AND residues notnull AND residues != '' ORDER BY common_name

SELECT feature.name, uniquename, feature_id, type_id, feature.organism_id, abbreviation, genus, species, common_name FROM cvterm LEFT JOIN feature ON cvterm.cvterm_id=feature.type_id LEFT JOIN organism ON organism.organism_id=feature.organism_id WHERE organism.common_name=#value# AND ( cvterm.name LIKE '%chromosome%' OR cvterm.name LIKE '%sequence%' OR cvterm.name IN ('supercontig', 'ultra_scaffold', 'golden_path_region', 'contig') ) AND residues notnull AND residues != '' ORDER BY common_name

SELECT substr(residues, fl.fmin+1, fl.fmax-fl.fmin) AS residues, length(residues) AS seqLen, fl.fmin, fl.fmax, fl.strand, fl.phase FROM featureloc fl LEFT JOIN feature f ON fl.srcfeature_id=f.feature_id WHERE fl.feature_id=(SELECT feature_id FROM feature WHERE uniquename=#value#);
sqlMap.update: UPDATE feature SET uniquename=#uniqueName#, is_obsolete=#obsolete# , name=#name# , type_id=$cvTerm.cvTermId$ , timelastmodified=#timeLastModified# WHERE feature_id=$featureId$

UPDATE feature SET residues=substring(residues from 1 for $startBase$) ||
#newSubSequence# ||
substring(residues from $endBase$ for $basesToEnd$), seqlen=$seqLen$ WHERE feature_id=$featureId$
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO feature ( feature_id, organism_id, name, uniquename, type_id , seqlen , dbxref_id ) VALUES ( nextval('feature_feature_id_seq'), $organism.organismId$, #name#, #uniqueName#, $cvTerm.cvTermId$ , $seqLen$ , $dbXRef.dbXRefId$ )
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM feature WHERE uniquename=#uniqueName# AND type_id=$cvTerm.cvTermId$
